name: auth0-management
title: Auth0 Management
description: Search and manage Auth0 users across multiple tenants
author: ray_tan

commands.name: search-users
commands.title: Search Users
commands.subtitle: Auth0
commands.description: Search Auth0 users by name, email, or user ID

commands.name: switch-tenant
commands.title: Switch Tenant
commands.subtitle: Auth0
commands.description: View and switch between Auth0 tenants

commands.name: view-logs
commands.title: View Logs
commands.subtitle: Auth0
commands.description: Browse Auth0 tenant logs - logins, failures, errors

commands.name: view-apps
commands.title: View Apps
commands.subtitle: Auth0
commands.description: Browse Auth0 applications and their settings

commands.name: view-apis
commands.title: View APIs
commands.subtitle: Auth0
commands.description: Browse Auth0 APIs (resource servers) and their scopes

commands.name: view-connections
commands.title: View Databases
commands.subtitle: Auth0
commands.description: Browse Auth0 database connections and create new ones

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
